original_title: New Indians: el camino del grunge
overview: The grunge group led by former member of the Golden Generation and the San Antonio Spurs Fabricio Oberto (vocals), with Luciano Moroni (guitar), Fede Galán (bass) and Jota Suárez (drums), play in 2019 in the United States and attend Ginóbili’s farewell.
title: New Indians: el camino del grunge
